analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol)

Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol)

Crowdsale.beneficiary should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol#284-287)
Crowdsale.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x3c90a252ec61e922dd4de6481f1761b6a30993ed.sol#307-308)
